data.text: Help make the park beautiful again. Click the tool and then click the area where it can be used.
data.feedback: Oh no! You can't use this here! Try again!
data.text: Broom: for clearing the litter. All the litter will be placed in the bin.
Lawnmower: for trimming the wild grass. Grass to be mowed and neatened up.
Shovel: to dig up the flower bed. It would be ready for new seeds to be planted.
Flower seeds: to be sown in the flower bed. New flower to be shown growing and blooming.
Watering can: over the flower bed and the grass. All become green and colorful again.
Wrench: to fix the swing (swing joins again).
Broom: for cleaning the path. The path will be cleared for walking or jogging.
